Title: Siblings Fighting Strategy
Text: Carer is preparing dinner in the kitchen and can hear the kids start arguing in the lounge over a game and who gets to go first.

Options.Description: "Right thats it! If you can't play nicely, I am taking the game away."
Children start shouting their side of the story...
They are playing games on their phone, does not pay attention to the children arguing in the lounge.

Options.Text: Carer begs children to play nicely
